name: CTS
description: CTS Group of companies is a privately held concern principally engaged in the fields of pharmaceuticals, crop protection and public hygiene products, medical equipment and hospital supplies, health care products, toiletries, veterinary products, audio-visual, imaging and microform equipment, high quality pharmaceuticals produced as tablets, capsules (including sustained release formulations), creams, gels, liquids and ointments, as well as vitamin and mineral supplements.
